Tea Botanics produces age-wellness teaceuticals that address the body and brain health needs for women leading up to and including menopause. GABA infusion is our “meno-magic”. Founded by Dr. Surinder Kumar, PhD in Food Science & Nutrition, and retired food industry exec, TruEats is designed to provide balanced nutrition AND still taste great!  TruEats ingredients are carefully selected with no "filler" starches (like tapioca, cassava, bamboo or sugarcane fibers) that can spike blood sugar.  Designed with a proprietary blend of Lentils, Chickpea, Buckwheat, & Almond Flours, and Sweetened w/ Monk Fruit, TruEats helps support healthy blood sugar, and other health benefits.
